verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle <WG652> (not <WG3756> from <WG575> men, <WG444> neither <WG3761> through <WG1223> man, <WG444> but <WG235> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> God <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> who <WG3588> raised <WG1453> him <WG846> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>),
and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the brothers <WG80> who are <WG3588> with <WG4862> me, <WG1698> to the assemblies <WG1577> of Galatia: <WG1053>
Grace <WG5485> to you <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> from <WG575> God <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>

who <WG3588> gave <WG1325> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> our <WG2257> sins, <WG266> that <WG3704> he might deliver <WG1807> us <WG2248> out <WG1537> of this <WG3588> present <WG1764> evil <WG4190> age, <WG165> according to <WG2596> the will <WG2307> of our <WG2257> God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962>â€”
to whom <WG3739> be the glory <WG1391> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

I marvel <WG2296> that <WG3754> you are <WG3346> so <WG3779> quickly <WG5030> deserting <WG3346> him <WG575> who <WG3588> called <WG2564> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> the grace <WG5485> of Christ <WG5547> to <WG1519> a different <WG2087> "good news <WG2098>";

and <WG3739> there <WG2076> isn't <WG3756> another <WG1487> "good news. <WG3361>" Only there are <WG1526> some <WG5100> who <WG3588> trouble <WG5015> you, <WG5209> and <WG2532> want <WG2309> to pervert <WG3344> the Good News <WG2098> of Christ. <WG5547>

But <WG235> even <WG2532> though <WG1437> we, <WG2249> or <WG2228> an angel <WG32> from <WG1537> heaven, <WG3772> should preach to you <WG5213> any <WG2097> "good news" other than <WG3844> that which <WG3739> we preached <WG2097> to you, <WG5213> let him be <WG2077> cursed. <WG331>

As <WG5613> we have said before, <WG4280> so <WG2532> I <WG3004> now <WG737> say again: <WG3825> if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man preaches to you <WG5209> any <WG2097> "good news" other than <WG3844> that <WG3739> which you received, <WG3880> let him be <WG2077> cursed. <WG331>

For <WG1063> am I <WG3982> now <WG737> seeking the favor <WG3982> of men, <WG444> or <WG2228> of God? <WG2316> Or <WG2228> am I striving <WG2212> to please <WG700> men? <WG444> For <WG1063> if <WG1487> I <WG302> were still <WG2089> pleasing <WG700> men, <WG444> I <WG302> wouldn't <WG3756> be <WG2252> a servant <WG1401> of Christ. <WG5547>

But <WG1161> I make known <WG1107> to you, <WG5213> brothers, <WG80> concerning <WG3588> the Good News <WG2098> which <WG3588> was preached <WG2097> by <WG5259> me, <WG1700> that <WG3754> it is <WG2076> not <WG3756> according <WG2596> to man. <WG444>

For <WG1063> neither <WG3761> did I <WG1473> receive <WG3880> it <WG846> from man, <WG444> nor was I <WG1473> taught <WG1321> it, <WG846> but <WG235> it came to me through <WG1223> revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

For <WG1063> you have heard of <WG191> my <WG1699> way of living <WG391> in time past <WG4218> in <WG1722> the Jews <WG2454>' religion, how that <WG3754> beyond <WG2596> measure <WG5236> I persecuted <WG1377> the assembly <WG1577> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> ravaged <WG4199> it. <WG846>

I <WG2532> advanced <WG4298> in <WG1722> the Jews <WG2454>' religion beyond <WG5228> many <WG4183> of my own age <WG4915> among <WG1722> my <WG3450> countrymen, <WG1085> being <WG5225> more exceedingly <WG4056> zealous <WG2207> for the traditions <WG3967> of my <WG3450> fathers. <WG3862>

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> it was the good pleasure <WG2106> of God, <WG2316> who <WG3588> separated <WG873> me <WG3165> from <WG1537> my <WG3450> mother <WG3384>'s womb, <WG2836> and <WG2532> called <WG2564> me through <WG1223> his <WG846> grace, <WG5485>

to reveal <WG601> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> that <WG2443> I might preach <WG2097> him <WG846> among <WG1722> the Gentiles, <WG1484> I didn't <WG3756> immediately <WG2112> confer <WG4323> with flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood, <WG129>

nor <WG3761> did I go up <WG424> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> to <WG4314> those who were <WG3588> apostles <WG652> before <WG4253> me, <WG1700> but <WG235> I went <WG565> away into <WG1519> Arabia. <WG688> <WG2532> Then <WG3825> I returned <WG5290> to <WG1519> Damascus. <WG1154>

Then <WG1899> after <WG3326> three <WG5140> years <WG2094> I went up <WG424> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> to visit <WG2477> Peter, <WG4074> and <WG2532> stayed <WG1961> with <WG4314> him <WG846> fifteen <WG1178> days. <WG2250>
But <WG1161> of the other <WG2087> apostles <WG652> I <WG1492> saw no one, <WG3756> except <WG1508> James, <WG2385> the <WG80> Lord <WG2962>'s brother. <WG80>
Now <WG1161> about the things which <WG3739> I write <WG1125> to you, <WG5213> behold, <WG2400> before <WG1799> God, <WG2316> I <WG3756>'m not <WG3754> lying. <WG5574>
Then <WG1899> I came <WG2064> to <WG1519> the regions <WG2824> of Syria <WG4947> and <WG2532> Cilicia. <WG2791>
I <WG1161> was <WG2252> still unknown <WG50> by face <WG4383> to the assemblies <WG1577> of Judea <WG2449> which were <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547>

but <WG1161> they <WG2258> only <WG3440> heard: <WG191> "He <WG3754> who <WG3588> once <WG4218> persecuted <WG1377> us <WG2248> now <WG3568> preaches <WG2097> the faith <WG4102> that <WG3739> he once <WG4218> tried to destroy. <WG4199>"
And <WG2532> they glorified <WG1392> God <WG2316> in <WG1722> me. <WG1698>
